DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare effect cilnidipine ( calcium channel blocker ) losartan ( angiotensin II receptor blocker ) cerebral blood flow ( CBF ) blood pressure hypertensive patient previous ischemic stroke .
DOC.brief_title: Cilnidipine Effect High Blood Pressure Cerebral Perfusion Ischemic Stroke Patients With Hypertension
DOC.detailed_description: Design : Multi-center , randomize , double-blind , active control , titrate dose , non-inferiority trial Population Studied : We prospectively recruit 250 hypertensive patient ischemic stroke 2 week previously admit 7 center Seoul metropolitan area South Korea . Interventions : After 2-week washout period , patient undergo baseline 99mTc-HMPAO single photon emission compute tomography ( SPECT ) , blood pressure evaluation , NIHSS examination , laboratory test prior treatment . The patient randomize receive either cilnidipine 10-20mg losartan 50-100mg daily 4 week target systolic blood pressure < 140mmHg diastolic blood pressure < 90mmHg . After 4-week treatment , patient receive follow-up SPECT blood pressure evaluation . For quantitative CBF analysis , SPECT perform single machine one center . Outcome Measures : Primary outcome measure percentile change global CBF SPECT pre- post-treatments . Secondary outcome measure include percentile change regional CBF , proportion patient less 8.6 % decrease global CBF , change NIHSS score .
